ygData.subject: Re: Pie Tins
ygData.msgSnippet: In both cases, the pie tins are there because a player potter sold them to the NPC while building his skill up.  Try buying them from him, at some point they
ygData.messageBody:
In both cases, the pie tins are there because a player potter sold them to
the NPC while building his skill up. Try buying them from him, at some
point they will dissappear. NO NPC carries Pie Tins as part of their
stock. They only have what players sell to them.


Zach Heaven wrote:

> From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
>
> *SPOILER*
>
> I have found pie tins in two good places. They sell
> for around 9gp each.
>
> In GFaydark take the Orc Lift in Kethkin(sp?) up.
> Across one bridge or up one ramp (can't remember, need
> to go look again) there is an Inn. The vendor in the
> Inn sells pie tins if you scroll down just a bit. My
> wife (Mariposa) found this.
>
> In Freeport North, if you turn out of the bank and
> take an immediate left there is an un-named building
> with two women in it. The woman on the right sells
> pie tins. For about the same price.
>
> -Kryogen, Bertoxxulous
